metadata.title: Horse Fairy String Lights Cute Pony Decorative Lights 20 Leds Night Light 8.5ft Battery Operated with Remote for Bedroom Farmhouse Home Holiday Thanksgiving Decoration
features: 【Exquisite Appearance Design】Design for excellence, rich in details. This unique fun string lights is carefully designed to incorporate as many details as possible in a limited volume to ensure the vividness and beauty of the horse. Every pony can stand on a flat surface, just like a herd of glowing horses, a special mood light

【Multiple Usage Occasion】Such an elegant decorative Lights with rich detail and texture could be used in a variety of Occasions. The glowing ponies running around the Christmas and Thanksgiving centerpiece can make the table arrangement more unique and fun. Your child will love this in bedroom or tent as decorative night light. It makes great birthday party Christmas tree light.

【Better Quality and Safe for Everyone】We use 0.45 diameter copper wire compares to 0.38 diameter of other products, which make our item more durable. This wire will never go hot, it is also water resistant and can work in humid environment for a period (Keep battery pack dry). Even if the lamp wire is damaged or broken, there will be no leakage. It can work safely near children and pets.

【Remote Control Provides Timer and Flicker Function】6 Hrs build-in timer provides automatic shut off (6 hours on and 18 hours off and 6 hours on again), plus brightness dimmer and flicker function, easy to use and save your batteries. The remote also offer 9 different flicker mode and speed. You can easily control the lights even when it is out of your reach.
【Battery Operated】 The water resistant battery box allows you to use this product flexibly anywhere, we recommend using rechargeable batteries.
description: We have put a lot of effort into the design to make sure that this will not be a cheap and inferior lamp. We are committed to creating a unique lighting design. The pony design is inspired by a white pony walking in the farm, carefree, excited and happy. I hope this cute shining little lantern can make her master feel the same joy. This light can be used as a unique party decoration, gift decoration, bedroom and bathroom night light. Decoration of horse-related collections. Christmas tree hanging ornaments. At the same time as a string of lights that can stand on the table, a group of running shiny ponies will attract everyone's attention. This Horse string light is great for romantic, elegant, warm atmosphere, suitable for New Year Party, Christmas Day décor, shop display. Horses are so elegant and smart. They are the best friend of human being. Why not add them to your home decor? These gorgeous golden ponies should have a place in every home. Whether it be a large painting or just a small detail, these unique creatures make for wonderful design muses. This item was powered by battery, you can use it in your office, bathroom, bedroom, no outlet needed at all. You can also use it creatively, for example, decorate a gift bag with the lights, you could use the module inside the box, 3AA batteries will offer more than 100 hours constant working time.

title: Super cute!!
